channel.title: Uptime
channel.description:
Hey guys, just a question here.
On the moparscape server status, when your server goes offline for 2 mins & drops down 1%, does it ever go back up? Like if the server doesn't go off for 24 hours or something?
Or is the system built on a fraction %? Meaning if it goes off ones, it'll never go back to 99% or 100%.

item.title: Uptime
item.dc:creator: @teh_one teh one
item.description:
@teh_one wrote:

Okay, thanks for the quick reply btw.

For some reason, Mopar started us on 80%. No idea why, this is the first release under this no-ip/Ip address.

Read full topic

item.title: Uptime
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

Correct. It will never go back to 100%.

Read full topic
